summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KasaBurger management system - Backend APIs 100% functional, Frontend has authentication integration issues

ui_bugs.issue: Missing password confirmation field validation - form shows 'Lütfen tüm alanları doldurun' error

integration_issues.issue: Login fails with 401 error using test credentials test@kasaburger.com / test123456
Dealer login fails with 401 error - dealers need to be created by admin first

passed_tests: Auth API - Register and Login (JWT) via API
PDF Export - Invoice PDF generation working
Excel Export - All report types working
XML Export - E-Fatura XML generation working
Dealer Portal API - All endpoints working
Frontend UI - All forms and elements render correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication integration: 1) Add password confirmation field to registration form, 2) Verify test user credentials or create default admin user, 3) Ensure dealer creation flow works from admin panel before dealer portal access

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - UI renders correctly but authentication integration fails
